column2: Tindak Malaysia (2025), Laporan Pilihanraya Umum Dewan Undangan Negeri Sarawak 1991, State Elections in Sarawak (1969 - 1991) by James Ritchie and Tan Chin Siang,  Almanak keputusan pilihan raya umum : Parlimen & Dewan Undangan Negeri, 1959-1999 (Anzagain Sdn Bhd), Chin, J. (1996). The 1991 Sarawak election: continuity of ethnic politics. South East Asia Research, 4(1), 23–40. http://www.jstor.org/stable/23746927. For more information, please refer to SARAWAK_1991_Other_Sources_DUN_File

There are gaps in the age data for the candidates. PBDS is in state opposition but remains as a member of Barisan Nasional at the federal level. PBDS was eventually readmitted to BN Sarawak in 1994. Though barred by BN federally for PBDS to cooperate with DAP, local PBDS and DAP in Sarikei struck an arrangement in a one-to-one contest against Sarawak BN (DAP contest in Repok and PBDS contest in Meradong).
